item.title: 交叉熵损失函数的梯度
item.author: aeinrw@gmail.com (aeinrw)
item.description: 交叉熵梯度的推导 交叉熵损失函数 $$ L(\theta) = -[y^{T}ln(h_{\theta}(X))+(1-y^{T})ln(1-h_{\theta}(X))] $$ $x$为单个样本 $$ x_{n \times 1} = \begin{pmatrix} x_{1}\\ …\\ x_{n} \end{pmatrix} $$ $$ h_{\theta}(x)_{1 \times 1} = \frac{1}{1+e^{-x^{T}\theta}} $$ $X$为全部样本 $$ X_{m\times n} = \begin{pmatrix} x^{(1)}_{1} & … & x^{(1)}_{n}\\ … & … & …\\ x^{(m)}_{1}
